Articles.Content:
This is a minor one, and I was surprised to not see it in a search...

My m4d math skillz are "1, 2, 3... many" so I have a really hard time realizing how much funds a complex contract can return.

Could we have a line that includes the completion amount and all the little sub amounts, for science/reputation/funds, please?

I wrote a Python script to parse the SFS files and print out contract info, and I discovered some that were difficult, with small completion amounts, so I was going to pass them up because I didn't realize the sub tasks added up to $450k funds.
